DOC.brief_summary: The study design compare meal time glucose control associate BIOD-531 , rapidly absorb concentrated insulin associate Humalog Mix 75/25 Humulin R U-500 patient diabetes severe insulin resistance .
DOC.brief_title: BIOD-531 vs. Humalog Mix 75/25 vs. Humulin R U-500 Post-Meal Glucose Control Patients With Severe Insulin Resistance
DOC.criteria: BMI > 25 kg/m2 Diabetes Mellitus use ≥ 150 unit insulin insulin analog per day and/or ≥ 100 unit insulin insulin analog single dose session least 1 month prior screen HbA1c < 10.0 % History bariatric surgery Corticosteroid therapy Significant cardiovascular major organ disease Females breast feeding pregnant A sexually active person use adequate contraceptive method
